name: Glory Kingdom
description: Prepare for a new tower defence, with a classic low poly style. Challenge many savage enemies, warriors, and monsters. Travel across your Kingdoms, to numerous environments where you take up the quest to protect your Kingdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 480 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3.20 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
